data.value: Something went wrong. Try again in a few minutes.

data.name: DigestPreferenceCardHeaderText
data.value: You can configure more topics or different ones as well as change how often the digest is posted.
data.comment: Digest preference card header text.

data.name: DigestPreferenceCardContent
data.value: You can set digest preference by selecting the frequency and tab you wants to follow.
data.comment: Digest preference card content.

data.name: WelcomeCardSuggestText
data.value: **Suggest:** Share content that's relevant to your team
data.comment: Welcome card suggest text.

data.name: PersonalWelcomeCardDiscoverButtonText
data.comment: Welcome card button text.

data.name: WelcomeCardContent
data.value: Hello, I am Submit an idea bot and I can help you to submit an innovative idea in a selected category to be visible to all colleagues and leadership, ideas can be voted upon and a leader board of best idea contributors can be shared.
data.comment: Welcome card content text.

data.name: WelcomeCardCreatePrivateList
data.value: **Save:** Create a private list of links to visit later
data.comment: Welcome card create private list text.

data.name: WelcomeCardDiscoverText
data.comment: Welcome card discover test.

data.name: WelcomeCardCommandHeaderText
data.value: Here are the commands I follow and what they do:
data.comment: Welcome card commands header text.

data.comment: Welcome card title text.

data.name: TagsLabelText

data.name: TaskModuleTitleText
data.comment: Task module title text to show while setting the preferences for team.

data.name: CarouselCard1Text
data.value:
Discover content by Tags, Type, Suggested by and sort by Popularity/latest based on your interest.
Add content to your private list and visit later to learn and grow.
Share content that influenced or inspired you with your co-workers.
data.comment: Carousel Card text.

data.name: CarouselCard2Text
data.value: Get a digest of content that are added based on your preference in a channel to stay updated on the topics.
data.comment: Carousel Card text.

data.name: CarouselCard3Text
data.value:
Add {0} to the Channel Tab based on tags to learn together with your team.
Share your favorite reads in a channel or chat to help your Peers grow.
data.comment: Carousel Card text.

data.name: ApplicationName
data.comment: Application name to show on carousel card content.

data.value: Ready to get started? Sign in!
